quote: Upon waking this morningâ€¦ What if all that remained were the people and things for which I had expressed Gratitude the day before? I shudder to think of all that would found to be missing.
quote_letters: UPON WAKING THIS MORNING WHAT IF ALL THAT REMAINED WERE THE PEOPLE AND THINGS FOR WHICH I HAD EXPRESSED GRATITUDE THE DAY BEFORE I SHUDDER TO THINK OF ALL THAT WOULD FOUND TO BE MISSING
